services.title: STYLISTS
services.description: Our team is here for all your styling needs, whether it's help finding one amazing look for an upcoming event or a complete wardrobe update.

services.title: BEAUTY SERVICES
services.description: Learn how to recreate the latest looks, get glam for a special event or discover the perfect products for your complexion. We offer makeovers, facials, skincare consultations and more.

services.title: PERSONAL SHOPPERS
services.description: For the most exclusive shopping experience, get one-on-one, 24/7 assistance from our pros in a private consultation space and fitting room. Available by appointment only.

services.title: CORPORATE GIFTS
services.description: Our gifting experts can help you find the best items to show your appreciation for valued employees and important clients. Plus, most bulk orders qualify for discounts.

services.title: DESIGN TRADE PROGRAM
services.description: For interior designers, architects and licensed contractors, our experts offer personalized help selecting products, placing orders, and coordinating deliveries. Plus, we offer a generous trade discount, as well as Loyallist points on purchases.

services.title: HOME STYLISTS
services.description: Our team can shop the store with you to curate your home from scratch or help you update with finishing touches, from luxury dinnerware to bedding and bath linens, rugs and custom furniture.

services.title: TAILORING & ALTERATIONS
services.description: Our highly skilled team of tailors ensure a perfect fit for every look from denim to custom suiting in the style and fabric of your choice.

services.title: STUDIO SERVICES
services.description: We support designers, costumers and stylists in finding perfect wardrobes and props for feature films, commercials and TV programs. Personal and wardrobing stylists can borrow merchandise for fittings for up to 7 days, and incur no charges until their client decides what to keep.

services.title: THE REGISTRY
services.description: Find everything you need for the big day and beyond, from exclusive discounts to dedicated personal consultants. We also offer helpful tools, checklists and guides including our handy Thank You Card manager.

services.title: VISITOR SERVICES
services.description: Make the most of your visit with special discount offers, store directories in various languages, translators, a coat check, concierge services and more.
